remarks: Value of the section relation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
issect.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
issect.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
issect.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
issect.i $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
issect.s $e |- S = ( Sect ` C ) $.
issect.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
issect.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
issect.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
sectfval $p |- ( ph -> ( X S Y ) = { <. f , g >. | ( ( f e. ( X H Y ) /\ g e. ( Y H X ) ) /\ ( g ( <. X , Y >. .x. X ) f ) = ( .1. ` X ) ) } ) $.
$d .1. f g $.
$d .x. f g $.
$d C f g $.
$d H f g $.
$d X f g $.
$d Y f g $.
$d f g ph $.
